name: Knight's Raid: Lost Skytopia
storyline: Stepping into the Karlmoss, a world full of mysterious stories and undiscovered treasures, you will embark on an adventure of fantasies. To save the fractured Skytopia, you need to assemble and strengthen heroes of different races and classes to form a powerful team. By joining the guild, you can fight alongside other adventures to defeat monsters, win a lot of rewards and great honor for yourselves and your guild.
summary: Knight’s Raid: Lost Skytopia is a fantasy anime card game with generous benefits and innovative gameplays. Players will step into the Karlmoss, which is a world full of mysterious stories and undiscovered treasures.
